querystring.select: SELECT ACR.USER_NAME AS UserName, URRM.DESCR AS UserRelationship
querystring.from: FROM DBO.APP_COLLATERAL AC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DBO.APP_COLLATERAL_REGISTRATION ACR WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACR.APP_COLLATERAL_ID = AC.APP_COLLATERAL_ID LEFT JOIN DBO.V_REF_MASTER URRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACR.MR_USER_RELATIONSHIP_CODE = URRM.MASTER_CODE AND URRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'CUST_PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIP'

querystring.select: SELECT ACR.OWNER_NAME AS OwnerName, ACR.OWNER_ADDR AS OwnerAddr, ORRM.DESCR AS OwnerRelationship,  CONCAT(ACR.OWNER_AREA_CODE_4,' / ', ACR.OWNER_AREA_CODE_3) AS RtRw, ITRM.DESCR AS IdType, ACR.OWNER_AREA_CODE_2 AS Kelurahan, ACR.OWNER_AREA_CODE_1 AS Kecamatan, ACR.OWNER_ID_NO AS OwnerIdNo, ACR.OWNER_CITY AS City, ACR.OWNER_MOBILE_PHN_NO AS MobilePhn, ACR.OWNER_ZIPCODE AS Zipcode
querystring.from: FROM DBO.APP_COLLATERAL AC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DBO.APP_COLLATERAL_REGISTRATION ACR WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACR.APP_COLLATERAL_ID = AC.APP_COLLATERAL_ID LEFT JOIN DBO.V_REF_MASTER ORRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACR.MR_OWNER_RELATIONSHIP_CODE = ORRM.MASTER_CODE AND ORRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'CUST_PERSONAL_RELATIONSHIP' LEFT JOIN DBO.V_REF_MASTER ITRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACR.MR_ID_TYPE_CODE = ITRM.MASTER_CODE AND ITRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ID_TYPE'

querystring.select: SELECT ACR.LOCATION_ADDR AS Addr, ACR.LOCATION_AREA_CODE_1 AS Kecamatan, ACR.LOCATION_AREA_CODE_2 AS Kelurahan, CONCAT(ACR.LOCATION_AREA_CODE_4, ' / ', ACR.LOCATION_AREA_CODE_3) AS RtRw, ACR.LOCATION_CITY AS City, ACR.LOCATION_ZIPCODE AS Zipcode
querystring.from: FROM DBO.APP_COLLATERAL AC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DBO.APP_COLLATERAL_REGISTRATION ACR WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACR.APP_COLLATERAL_ID = AC.APP_COLLATERAL_ID
